sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"吸引，引诱"之意。
means: attract ：普通用词，指客观上吸引人的注意力。
charm ：侧重迷住某人或使之高兴。
enchant ：着重指有能力引起被迷住者的欢乐或赞美。
fascinate ：通常含使人无法拒绝、无法摆脱的意味。
tempt ：指吸引力很强，强调欲望被唤醒。

sentence.Network_en: Percy's enchant-ment with orchids dates back to 1951.
sentence.Network_cn: 珀西对兰花的痴迷可以回溯到1951年。

sentence.Network_en: At this repast, Mr. Chuckster exerted his utmost abilities to enchant his entertainers.
sentence.Network_cn: 在吃点心的时候, 查尔斯先生竭力卖弄他的本领,媚悦他的东道主.

sentence.Network_en: The spectacle of the aurora may appear to dazzle and enchant the observer's eye.
sentence.Network_cn: 极光的壮丽景色的出现,会使观察者为之眩目和迷惑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the senses 'put under a spell' and 'delude'; formerly also as inchant): from French enchanter, from Latin incantare, from in- 'in' + cantare 'sing'

entry.def: If you are enchanted by someone or something, they cause you to have feelings of great delight or pleasure.

example.ex: Dena was enchanted by the house...
example.tran: 德娜非常喜欢那座房子。

example.ex: She enchanted you as she has so many others.
example.tran: 她迷住了你，就像她迷住了其他那么多人一样。

entry.def: In fairy stories and legends, to enchant someone or something means to put a magic spell on them.

example.ex: King Arthur hid his treasures here and Merlin enchanted the cave so that nobody should ever find them.
example.tran: 亚瑟王将他的财宝藏在这里，墨林对洞穴施了魔法，这样永远不会有人找到那些财宝。

example.ex: ...Celtic stories of cauldrons and enchanted vessels.
example.tran: 有关大锅和施了魔法的船的凯尔特传说

means.word_mean: 3. cast a spell over someone or something; put a hex on someone or something

auth_sentence.content: There was only one man she needed to enchant, and he was here.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was only one man she needed to enchant, and he was here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was only one man she needed to enchant, and he was here.

auth_sentence.content: Adaptable and limitless, they transform themselves as they enchant the rest of us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Adaptable and limitless, they transform themselves as they enchant the rest of us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Adaptable and limitless, they transform themselves as they enchant the rest of us.

auth_sentence.content: Now, three years on, its follow up seems no less likely to enchant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, three years on, its follow up seems no less likely to enchant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, three years on, its follow up seems no less likely to enchant.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

sentences.en: He was enchanted by the idea.
sentences.cn: 他为这个主意而欣喜若狂。

jushi.english: The happy family scene had enchanted him.
jushi.chinese: 这天伦之乐的情景使他激动不已。
